text: Brigadier General Óscar Humberto Mejía Victores (December 9, 1930 - February 1, 2016) was a Guatemalan politician. He was the 27th President of Guatemala from 8 August 1983 to 14 January 1986. Victores died in Guatemala City from Parkinson's disease on February 1, 2016 at the age of 85. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:Presidents of Guatemala Category:People from Guatemala City
title: Óscar Humberto Mejía Victores
